title: Asus VivoBook FL8700JP Hackintosh Guide
home_welcome: Run macOS Perfectly on Your Windows Laptop
faq_boot_sound: How to disable the startup 'bong' sound?
faq_boot_sound_ans: Go to System Settings → Sound → Uncheck 'Play sound on startup'.
faq_trackpad_ans: This is a known issue with the ELAN1200 driver. As a temporary workaround, try rebooting your system or putting it to sleep and waking it up again.
faq_default_os: How to change the default boot OS?
faq_default_os_ans: Two methods: Press Ctrl+Enter on the OpenCore boot screen to set the default entry; or go to System Settings → Startup Disk after booting into macOS.
faq_bluetooth_ans: Try the following: verify Bluetooth is properly driven, update to the latest EFI release, and rule out device-specific issues.
